required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Outcome of Children Born After Pregnancy Denial
clinical_study.official_title: Outcome Children Born After Pregnancy Denial

brief_summary.textblock:
The objective of this study is to evaluate the impact of denial pregnancy on children's health ( anthropometric data, psychomotor development , disease) at different age of evaluation ( at birth, 9 months, 24 months and between 2 and 6 years post natal age).
The hypothesis is the denial of pregnancy may have repercussions on children's outcome.

study_pop.textblock: Every children born at term after denial of pregnancy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Child born after denial of pregnancy
- Child born at term ( > 37 weeks of gestation)
- Born between the 1st january 2009 and the 30th june 2015 at Maternit√© Regionale de Nancy
Exclusion Criteria:
- Mother's opposition
- Child doesn't' living in France
